display_long_description:
[How to Play & Controls]
1. On the title screen, tilt the analog stick left or right to change the difficulty level (choose from EASY, NORMAL, or HARD).
2. Press the A or X button to start the game.
3. Avoid obstacles (cubes) and aim for a high score.
4. If your head hits a cube, your score will be displayed and you will be returned to the original title screen.
5. On the title screen, press and hold the trigger button to exit the app.

[How to operate Hand Tracking]
・DIFFICULTY SELECT : Put Left Hand Forward
・GAME START: Thumbs Up Right Hand (👍)
・RESET BEST TIME: Raise Index Finger Your Right Hand (☜)
・BGM[ON/OFF]: Raise Index Finger Your Left Hand (☞)
・QUIT: Thumbs Up Left Hand (👍)

[Game Tips & Specifications]
- Only the head has hit detection, so obstacles hitting the limbs or torso will not count. Therefore, avoid only obstacles near your face.
- The speed of the obstacles (cubes) is always constant and randomly generated.
- The controller is not displayed in-game, so it is recommended that you keep it in your hand at all times or place it in an easily visible location.
- The cube speed doubles as the difficulty level increases, but since dodging is extremely difficult on HARD, the number of cubes is set to a minimum.
- Crouching and jumping are also effective methods of avoiding obstacles.

[Summary]
The app is expected to improve reflexes and concentration to instantly avoid obstacles.
